title: Activity-Based Training Program for Enhancing Industrial Production Process Technology Using the ADDIE Model

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of programmable logic controllers (PLCs), sensors, and control devices
context.additional_context: Corporate job-linked training aimed at improving work efficiency for in-service professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze key stages of industrial production processes and propose at least three optimization strategies
Learners perform automation process design simulations using PLCs and sensors with over 80% accuracy
Learners document and present case studies of problem-solving in actual production lines through team-based projects
Learners execute process monitoring and quality control procedures using digital training kits with over 90% proficiency
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
